name: Atomic Society
detailed_description:
Atomic Society is a post-apocalyptic city-building game where you act as Judge and Jury.

In-Development Features:

  • Build your own post-apocalyptic settlement.
  • Set all the laws and morals people will live by.
  • Struggle to survive and grow your population.
  • Control your own character and perform optional tasks.
  • Deal with a wide range of choices both serious and amusing.
  • Be cruel or kind and make society how you see best.
  • Expand until you have hundreds of unique citizens.
  • Reclaim a barren world and make a bustling town.
  • And more features planned during development...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (Any Version From 7 upwards)
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (Any Version From 7 upwards)
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i5 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700+ (or equivalent)
